Lua for learning and laufs

1 June 2025

Hello World!

by Tim Anema

Hello! I can’t believe that you’re here! I have never done a blog before but I keep learning things here that I think I would like to practice writing about.

This project was never about implementing a version of lua that everyone would use. It is more about my own learning. The best way to make sure that you actually learned something is to explain it to someone else. So welcome my own rubber ducky.
